Earth Observation¶

Datasets¶

GA Earth Observation - Data

  • Landsat5 TM NBART
  • Landsat5 TM NBAR
  • Landsat5 TM PQ
  • Landsat7 ETM NBART
  • Landsat7 ETM NBAR
  • Landsat7 ETM PQ
  • Landsat8 OLI NBART
  • Landsat8 OLI NBAR
  • Landsat8 OLI PQ

GA Earth Observation - Derived

  • Australian Geographic Reference Image
  • Dynamic Land Cover Dataset
  • Fractional Cover v2.0
  • High and Low Tide Composites v2.0
  • Intertidal Extents Model v1.0
  • Intertidal Extents Model v2.0
  • National Intertidal Digital Elevation Model 25m v1.0.0
  • Pixel Quality
  • Surface Reflectance Geomedian v2.0
  • Water Observations from Space

  • GDAL command line
  • view and extract data using GDAL
  • ncdump
  • ncview

Data Manipulation¶

  • Python NetCDF XArray
  • Extract data using THREDDS NCSS
  • Extract data using OWSlib
  • Programmatically accessing data using Siphon
  • Combine datasets: OFAM and Himawari8
  • Combine datasets: Digital Elevation Model (DEM) and Himawari8
  • Python Siphon data subsetting example
  • Analyse and visualise data in QGIS

Use Cases¶

  • Vegetation fractional cover indicators for land and water management using MODIS data
